summary: Miscellaneous mods that I feel don't need their own mod pages. Includes unreleased weapons, unreleased armour, my bodyslide preset, hdt physics preset and maybe more down the line.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/79830-0-1477780926.png[/img][/center]
[u]Description[/u]

This is a collection of miscellaneous mods I've made that I didn't feel like making a separate mod page for. Some of these files are older than others, and do not represent my current works in any way. 

I will upload any random little mods I make in here. 



[u]Files[/u]

[color=#fff2cc]Bodyslide Preset:[/color] This is my personal bodyslide preset for CBBE. No massive boobs or wonky proportions here - just a simple, pleasing shape to my eye. Requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide[/url]. 

[color=#fff2cc]HDT Physics XML Preset:[/color] Customised to fit my bodyslide preset. Non-exaggerated bounce for breasts and butt, but still noticeable enough that it's not pointless. Made with JFF v4. Requires an HDT enabled body mesh and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url].

[color=#fff2cc]RaceMenu Presets:[/color] Various face presets for RaceMenu. I'll just put them all into the one file for convenience. Requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url], and [color=#d9ead3]optionally[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]Beards[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?]KS Hairdos HDT[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30823/?]Iridum Eyes[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48705/?]RaceMenu Overlays Compilation[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66404/?]Body Scars for RaceMenu[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]Freckle Mania[/url] (you don't NEED these, as you can load them fine in RaceMenu - though you may be missing hair or overlays - simply change the hairstyle or body paint and it'll be fine).

[color=#fff2cc]Buoyant Armiger Armour Resource:[/color] An armour mod I was working on shortly after finishing my Nordic Wanderer set. I stopped when I couldn't resolve some issues, so it's provided as-is here. Must be added via console commands, or by using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]AddItemMenu[/url].

[color=#fff2cc]Kinzon Sik-Zakhrii:[/color] A sword I was making that didn't turn out like the concept art I drew for it, so I didn't end up finishing it. It lacks some texture detail that my other weapons have, but it's still usable. Must be added via console commands, or by using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]AddItemMenu[/url].

[color=#fff2cc]Altar Resource:[/color] A random altar I made one day out of sheer boredom and a desire to do something a bit different. [color=#f6b26b]Note that the mesh does not have collisions or anything, and likely won't even be visible in-game without editing it first[/color]. You can still look at it in Nifskope, though. 



[u]Compatibility[/u]

Depends on the thing you download. Some stuff will overwrite, some stuff will not, and some stuff do nothing unless you make a mod out of it. 



[u]Installation[/u]

Copy the contents of archive to your Skyrim\Data folder. Activate the .esp in the Skyrim launcher. That's it! Alternatively, you can download with NMM and activate it through that.



[u]Permissions[/u]

Please don't redistribute any of these mod. If you use any of this stuff in a custom mod, send me a message so I'm aware. 



[u]Credits[/u]

Humus, for his cubemap bases. 

3DS Max 2016, NifSkope, Paint.NET, Photoshop, Quixel and Knald - the tools I use to make models and textures.

The authors of CBBE, RaceMenu, HDT Physics and all that. I can't be bothered to look your names up because I'm really lazy.
author: Billyro
